Figure Humanoid Robot.text:
WHAT: Figure is the first-of-its-kind AI robotics company bringing a general purpose humanoid to life.
CATEGORY: AI robotics
FEATURES: Height: 5'6"
, Payload: 20kg
, Weight: 70kg
, Runtime: 5hr
, Speed: 1.2M/S
, System: Electric
CAPABILITIES: The robot can perform end-to-end operations safely
, Learn and perform household tasks autonomously
, Operate in various environments like manufacturing, logistics, warehousing, and retail
, Think for itself and make decisions
, Support human workers in the workforce
, Solve labor shortages
, In the early stages of commercialization
, Still gathering customer feedback
, Potential for expansion into new markets
, Collaboration with a leading robotics team
, Cutting-edge AI and human form factor technology
, Designed for dexterity and efficiency in human-like tasks
, Notes: Figure is still in the alpha/beta/ga stage
, Potential for partnerships
, Focus on innovation and market impact
